text: Sphingomonas ginsengisoli is a bacterium from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from soil from a ginseng field in Pocheon in Korea.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas ginsengisoli at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase ginsengisoli Category:Bacteria described in 2013
title: Sphingomonas ginsengisoli
